body: Does anybody have a cool idea to add into a mod that I am creating?

replies.body:
The Macro/Keybind mod allows you to create macro commands in Minecraft, Say you wanted /ban (insertname) togglesneak 5days you could edit in the macro then put the name in. 
Im not sure if there's a way to macro a random players name though.
replies.body_tagged:
The Macro/Keybind mod allows you to create macro commands in Minecraft, Say you wanted /ban (insertname) togglesneak 5days you could edit in the macro then put the name in. 
Im not sure if there's a way to macro a random players name though.
